name: Number Sniper
description:
This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam 39, with the theme "Inversion"

Normally you would have had 9 days time, but I only took around 4-5 hours of it. Thats mainly the reason why there is no sound and the graphics are far from perfect, but I had a lot of run making the game and I hope some of you still enjoy it

In "Number Sniper" you have to click the numbers on the screen in the right order. For every connection after you pressed "finish" you get 1 point.

Example:

Row: 1 - 2 - 3 = 2 Points (2 Connections)

For a full row (1 to 10) you get 10 points

But watch out sometimes the numbers you collected can get INVERTED and your row could get destroyed

For every round you have 30 seconds to get the highest score, after this you can try again to beat your previous score

CONTROLS

ActionInput PCInput MobileCollect/Snipe NumberClicking on Numbers (Mouse)Clicking on Numbers (Touch)
Finish RowF / Click on Finish ButtonClick on Finish ButtonReset RowR  / Click on Reset ButtonClick on Reset Button
